title: Rad Power Sends Updated RadRover 6 Plus fat tire ebike Right Over
content:
In an update of its flagship ebike, Seattle’s Rad Power Bikes unveiled the new RadRover 6 Plus today. The new entry gets a solid update, from increased hill-climbing capability with a re-tuned 750W motor to a step-through frame option. The head unit interface, designed for easier operation, is also brand new.  “Rad Power Bikes is […]

The post Rad Power Sends Updated RadRover 6 Plus fat tire ebike Right Over appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
